Show / Hide Table of Contents

Class Vector3

Vector3 is represented simply by an list of double point numbers. So, you would write simply [1,0,0] to create a Vector3 in the X direction.

Declaration

Parameters
Type Name Description
Vector3 other

Vector to compare to.
System.Double tolerance

Angle tolerance (in radians), if not set used default one degree, expressed in radians.
Returns
Type Description
System.Int32

A parallel indicator: 1 vectors are parallel, 0 vectors are not parallel, -1 vectors are parallel but with opposite directions
